## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description                                                | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `alt` _(required)_ | `alt`     | Alternative Text                                           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `cover`            | `cover`   | Should the image cover the full width of the image itself. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `height`           | `height`  | Height of image in px or rem.                              | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `opacity`          | `opacity` | Opacity value; Integer 0 - 100.                            | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `src` _(required)_ | `src`     | Image source url.                                          | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `width`            | `width`   | Width of image in px or rem.                               | `number`  | `undefined` |
